@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump 🚨Update Alert🚨
Trump you also said the Coronavirus was a hoax. Currently 558,999+ people are confirmed to have it & 22,154+ people have DIED, “DIED!” At times like this we should be able to trust the “President” but your other 17K+ LIES make that IMPOSSIBLE!!  🚨Update Alert🚨 https://t.co/fODm2H3SF1
